customMethods.name: setByJsonIn
setByJsonExpo
customMethods.script:
# For example: jsonExpo = '{"Label.text":"Participants"}'
	pyExpo = system.util.jsonDecode(self.view.params.jsonExpo)
	
	#system.perspective.print(self.view.params.jsonExpo)
	#system.perspective.print(pyExpo)
	
	if isinstance(pyExpo,dict):
		lbl = self.getChild("Label")
		lbl.props.text = pyExpo.get('Label.text','x')
